question_text: Which of the following will correctly calculate 3 raised to the power of 4?
Which of the following will correctly round 5.3 up to the nearest whole number?
Which of the following will correctly calculate the absolute value of -10?
Which of the following will correctly calculate the square root of 16?
Which of the following will correctly return the smaller value between 8 and 15?
Which of the following will correctly return the larger value between 8 and 15?
How do you calculate the modulus of 15 divided by 4?
Which function calculates the cube root of 27?
Which function returns the largest integer less than or equal to 5.8?
What header file is required for math functions in C?
